text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Splendid!! You've completed your goal!! 
Applause!! Applause!!!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Depending on the Umamusume you're
training, their goals will be different.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
When you're training, please train your
Umamusume with the aim of achieving
her goals!
